title: SFEC Form 126f4 - Notification of Contract Approval - Filings
description:
Each City elective officer who approves a contract that has a total anticipated or actual value of $100,000 or more must file this form with the Ethics Commission within five business days of approval by: (a) the City elective officer, (b) any board on which the City elective officer serves, or (c) the board of any state agency on which an appointee of the City elective officer serves.  For more information, see: https://sfethics.org/compliance/city-officers/city-contracts/contract-approval-by-city-elective-officers.

This dataset includes paper SFEC Form 126 Notification of Contract Approval Filings from 2002 to November 2018, electronic SFEC Form 126 Notification of Contract Approval Filings between mid-October 2018 to December 31, 2018 and SFEC Form 126f4 Notification of Contract Approval Filings beginning January 1, 2019.

A copy of legacy filings without a url in the "Filing" column can be found archived on the Ethics Commission website: https://sfethics.org/ethics/category/contracts

The Affiliates and Subcontractors dataset (https://data.sfgov.org/d/czjm-dat8/) must be joined with the parent dataset (https://data.sfgov.org/d/ite2-5y3b) using the DocuSignID to connect affiliates and subcontractors to the approved contract.

columns.name: ContractDate
columns.description: Date of the contract

columns.name: DocuSignID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: FilingType
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: OriginalFilingDate
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: FilerContactName
columns.description: Name of person completing form. This person may be different than the contact person and signer

columns.name: FilerContactDepartmentName
columns.description: Department of person completing form

columns.name: FilerContactEmail
columns.description: Email of person completing form

columns.name: FilerContactTelephone
columns.description: Telephone number of person completing form

columns.name: DepartmentContactName
columns.description: Name of contact person at Department. This person may be different than the filer and signer

columns.name: DepartmentContactDepartmentName
columns.description: Department of contact person

columns.name: DepartmentContactEmail
columns.description: Email of contact person

columns.name: DepartmentContactTelephone
columns.description: Telephone number of contact person

columns.name: ElectiveOfficerName
columns.description: Name of elected officer

columns.name: ElectiveOfficerOffice
columns.description: Office of elected officer

columns.name: ContractorName
columns.description: Name of contractor that was awarded the contract

columns.name: ContractorTelephone
columns.description: Telephone number of contractor

columns.name: ContractorAddress
columns.description: Complete address of contractor

columns.name: ContractorEmail
columns.description: Email of contractor

columns.name: ContractThresholdAffirmation
columns.description: As of 1/1/2019, this field has been removed from this form. Checkbox to affirm the contract was at least $50,000

columns.name: ContractFileNumber
columns.description: Contract File Number (if applicable)

columns.name: ContractDescription
columns.description: Short description of the nature of the contract

columns.name: Comments
columns.description: Comment field

columns.name: ContractApprovalCityElectiveOfficer
columns.description: Checkbox indicating the City Elective Officer approved the contract. "X" indicates checked.

columns.name: ContractApprovalBoardStateAgency
columns.description: Checkbox indicating that on the state board that approved the contract there was a member who was appointed by the City Elective Officer(s) named on this form. "X" indicates checked.

columns.name: BoardStateAgency
columns.description: Name of the board of a state agency on which an appointee of the City Elective Officer(s) identified on this form sits.

columns.name: ContractApprovalBoard
columns.description: Checkbox indicating the contract was approved by the board on which the City Elective Officer(s) serves. "X" indicates checked.

columns.name: BoardName
columns.description: Name of the board on which the City Elective Officer(s) serves

columns.name: PartiesSubTableQuery
columns.description: URL of API query of Affiliates and Subcontractors dataset. Results are returned in JSON format.

columns.name: SupplementalCheck
columns.description: Checkbox indicating if additional pages are required to list all affiliates and subcontractors. If checked, there should be an additional filing of type "Supplemental".

columns.name: SignerName
columns.description: Signature of the City Elective Officer or Board Secretary or Clerk

columns.name: DateSigned
columns.description: Date form was signed and submitted to the Ethics Commission

columns.name: AmendmentDescription
columns.description: As of 1/1/2019, this field was added to this form. Explanation for Amendment, provided by filer

columns.name: BidRfpNumber
columns.description: As of 1/1/2019, this field was added to this form. Bid or RFP number of proposed contract

columns.name: UploadedDate
columns.description: Date uploaded to DataSF (paper filings only; for electronic filings DateSigned is the same as UploadedDate)

whom_it_may_interest: Government officials, researchers in government finance and contracting, business analysts

queries.Monthly: SELECT date_trunc_ym(contractdate) AS month, count(*) AS number_of_filings, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname WHERE contractdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY month, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname ORDER BY month, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname
queries.Yearly: SELECT date_trunc_y(contractdate) AS year, count(*) AS number_of_filings, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname WHERE contractdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY year, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname ORDER BY month, electiveofficeroffice, filingtype, boardname
